mapper.select: SELECT rt.request_type_name, () AS requester_email, re.request_id, re.start_date, re.end_date, re.duration, re.request_status, re.expected_approve_date, re.request_description, rs.reason_name, () AS approver_email, () AS supervisor_email, sua.supervisor_action_id, sua.action_type AS supervisor_action_type, sua.updated_at AS supervisor_updated_at, apa.approver_action_id, apa.action_type AS approver_action_type, apa.updated_at AS approver_updated_at, rqa.requester_action_id, rqa.action_type AS requester_action_type, rqa.updated_at AS requester_updated_at FROM request_employee re LEFT JOIN request rq ON rq.request_id = re.request_id LEFT JOIN request_type rt ON rt.request_type_id = rq.request_type_id LEFT JOIN reason rs ON rs.reason_id = rq.reason_id LEFT JOIN approver_action apa ON apa.approver_action_id = re.approver_action_id LEFT JOIN supervisor_action sua ON sua.supervisor_action_id = re.supervisor_action_id LEFT JOIN requester_action rqa ON rqa.requester_action_id = re.requester_action_id WHERE re.request_id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( rqa.requester_id = #{employeeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} OR sua.supervisor_id = #{employeeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} OR apa.approver_id = #{employeeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) ORDER BY rq.request_id DESC

SELECT rt.request_type_name, () AS requester, re.request_id, re.start_date, re.end_date, re.duration, re.request_status, re.request_description, re.expected_approve_date, rs.reason_name, () AS approver, () AS supervisor, re.approver_action_id, re.supervisor_action_id FROM request_employee re LEFT JOIN request rq ON rq.request_id = re.request_id LEFT JOIN request_type rt ON rt.request_type_id = rq.request_type_id LEFT JOIN reason rs ON rs.reason_id = rq.reason_id LEFT JOIN approver_action apa ON apa.approver_action_id = re.approver_action_id LEFT JOIN supervisor_action sua ON sua.supervisor_action_id = re.supervisor_action_id
( re.supervisor_action_id IN ( SELECT supervisor_action_id FROM supervisor_action WHERE supervisor_id = #{requestEmployee.employeeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) OR re.approver_action_id IN ( SELECT approver_action_id FROM approver_action WHERE approver_id = #{requestEmployee.employeeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) )
AND re.start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{requestEmployee.startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%Y-%m-%d")
AND re.end_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{requestEmployee.endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%Y-%m-%d")
AND re.request_status = #{requestEmployee.requestStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND rq.request_type_id = #{requestTypeId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY rq.request_id DESC
